nodes.text: I deeply appreciate the courage and wise counsel of leaders like Prime Minister Howard and President Kwasniewski and Prime Minister Berlusconi   and of course Prime Minister Tony Blair
I respect every soldier from every country who serves beside us in the hard work of history. America is grateful and America will not forget.
In the midst of war he has called America's allies quote a  coalition of the coerced and the bribed.
That would be nations like Great Britain Poland Italy Japan the Netherlands Denmark El Salvador Australia and others   allies that deserve the respect of all Americans not the scorn of a politician.
